channel.title: The cron.weekly newsletter on ma.ttias.be
channel.description: Recent content in The cron.weekly newsletter on ma.ttias.be

item.title: cron.weekly issue #157: Browsers, tailwind, podman, zfs & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #157. Hope you’re all having a solid week! I’m not, if I’m totally honest, and as a result I’m going to take a bit of break with the weekly newsletter.

item.title: cron.weekly issue #156: gping, dog, influxdb, kraken & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #156. Back after a small break, and boy have I got a big issue for you today!

item.title: cron.weekly issue #155: Fedora, pandoc, youtube-dl, vdx & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #155. Last week the cat co-wrote the issue, this time I’m joined by a frog.

item.title: cron.weekly issue #154: Ubuntu, HTTP/3, bat, git & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #154. Any typos will be blamed on the cat, who insisted he co-write this issue.

item.title: cron.weekly issue #153: Kernel 5.9, Julia, NPM, Waypoint & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #153. Lots of good stuff again this week!

item.title: cron.weekly issue #152: HTTP/3, eBPF, MySQL & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #152. A slightly shorter issue, but I just couldn’t find more interesting links this week.

item.title: cron.weekly issue #151: HTTPS, derek, ali, grep & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #151. A bit of drama, some very cool new projects, a variety of interesting guides/tips and a request for comments section.

item.title: cron.weekly issue #150: PostgreSQL, SSH, Calibre, duf & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #150. Pfew, we’ve had a busy week at Oh Dear.

item.title: cron.weekly issue #149: Arm, Epoch, endlessh, kb & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #149. Hope you’re all having a good week! Find yourself a nice cup of ‚òïÔ∏è and a ü•ê or two and have fun reading this issue.

item.title: cron.weekly issue #148: Caddy, Chef, TLS, grep & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #148. Looks like everyone’s been hiding their acquisition news until September, with major news from both Chef and Caddy this week!

item.title: cron.weekly issue #147: Bottlerocket, webify, Redis, htop, daemons & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #147. I feel recharged and ready for another round of Linux, php & open-source news!

item.title: cron.weekly issue #146: DNS, tunshell, i2p, umami & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #146. A quick heads-up: I’m taking my final summer holiday break next week, so I’ll be back in your inbox on September 6th!

item.title: cron.weekly issue #145: crush, openage, cortex, bash & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #145. This is a slightly shorter one, unless I missed it most news was dominated by Mozilla’s announcements this week.

item.title: cron.weekly issue #144: wiki, glab, postgresql, nfs & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #144. Lots of variety again, covering a list of Wiki-systems, a bit more PostgreSQL guides and the usual batch of interesting projects.

item.title: cron.weekly issue #143: gitify, nano, cfgdiff, Envoy, SQL & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #143. Back after a little break, feels good to write again!

item.title: cron.weekly issue #142: PHP, SSL, Debian, ip2unix, Ansible & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #142. There’s quite a bit of commotion around revoked SSL certificates, I hope none of you got bitten by that.

item.title: cron.weekly issue #141: Zettlr, Redis, gg, pipes, sysctl & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #141. Lots of variety in this issue again, these are the most fun ones to write.

item.title: cron.weekly issue #140: WWDC, ARM, TLS, ProcDump, Nginx & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #140. In next week’s issue I want to include a jobs section.

item.title: cron.weekly issue #139: VPN, Guix, expose, lynis, tor & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #139. Back to our regular schedule of Linux, open-source & webdev news!

item.title: cron.weekly issue #138: PHP, Nginx, Rust, ARM, choose & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #138. So many good content this week, plenty to keep you occupied I believe!

item.title: cron.weekly issue #137: Kernel 5.7, TrueNAS, LibreSSL, Drupal & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #137. This isn’t an easy episode. The news and video footage from the violence against black people coming from the US make it impossible for me to stay quiet.

item.title: cron.weekly issue #136: SSL, Security, Pest, Prometheus, Zsh & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #136. Quite a lot of interesting stories to share this week!

item.title: cron.weekly issue #135: Grafana, WebSockets, DNS, map, nix & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #135. I found a lot of interesting articles last week, I had to throw away almost 50% because it would be too much otherwise.

item.title: cron.weekly issue #134: Deno, Zabbix, semgrep, Prometheus & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #134. I hope everyone’s doing alright, keeping safe & sane and adjusting to this new reality.

item.title: cron.weekly issue #133: faketime, SaltStack, Caddy, GCC & more
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã Welcome to cron.weekly issue #133. Lots of newly found projects in this issue that I hope you’ll enjoy, together with a lot of interesting guides.
